title: WTF IS THAT BARREL RANGE IT WASN'T CONNECTED!!!!!!!!!

embed.description: THIS BARREL DIDN'T HAVE A LINK CONNECTING THE TWO YET IT DEALT DAMAGE ??????????????????? THERE WAS A MASSIVE GAP? GP, HELLO? WTF IS THAT!!!!!!!

body:
Um yeah if any Gp players could review this , would be much appreciated . Thank you !

replies.body: Honestly can't see the barrel lines in the recording (the one's around the barrel) which is the best way to measure it (being slightly longer then the barrel circle in distance you can drop the next barrel.)
